channel.title: [317] BANK HELP PLEASE LOOK! [317] && how to make npc hit higher or lower
channel.description:
umm i simple question how do i make a bank be on second story because i managed to spawn in right cords and right way facing how do i make it be on second story please help thank's =]
Also how do i make a barbarian hit higher than 1? like maybe 10 and make a hill giant hit max 20 instead of 50?

item.title: [317] BANK HELP PLEASE LOOK! [317] && how to make npc hit higher or lower
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

about the barbarian and hill giant : if (npcId == hillGiantId) {
npc.hit(entity, Misc.random(10))
npc.addKillerHit(entity, Misc.random(10))

means it will hit from 0 - 10 randomly

Read full topic
